channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A st Georges Cross has been painted over the mini roundabout and on the approach chevronss, 22nd August
item.description:
Mini roundabout at the junction of The Park and Moorend Park Road. This type of Politically based graffiti must be removed ASAP or it will spread throughout the County.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Park Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 barriers abandoned by contractors, 22nd August
item.description:
Abandoned barriers. Please remove. It was a shoddy job so only follows shoddy service
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 144;146;148;150;152;154, Orchard Avenue, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Overgrown footpath, 22nd August
item.description:
Meads Alley to Parton road public path neglected, nettles and brambles - the path is greatly in need of attention especially as school children and parents and elderly use this path, please can it be given attention before the return to school on 3 September 2025 - many thanks most grateful

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 22nd August
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure please lift and replace x1 broken kerb 900x150x20mm stats required (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)

item.title: The road surface is totally degraded and the yellow makings are in some areas, obliterated making traffic wardens job impossible, 22nd August
item.description:
The whole road is degraded and covered in shale debris. The road markings are obliterated in places.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
